-> _ = "breakpoint"
(godebug) n
-> switch a := a(); {
(godebug) next
-> default:
(godebug) next
-> _ = a
(godebug) a
0
(godebug) next
-> _ = "the variable a should be out of scope"
(godebug) a
Command not recognized, sorry!
(godebug) continue
hello
test
-> _ = "breakpoint"
(godebug) n
-> const n = 10
(godebug) next
-> _ = n
(godebug) print n
10
(godebug) next
-> name1(5)
(godebug) step
-> if true {
(godebug) print name1
5
(godebug) next
-> _ = name1
(godebug) next
-> name2()
(godebug) step
-> if true {
(godebug) print name2
""
(godebug) next
-> name2 = "foo"
(godebug) next
-> return name2
(godebug) print name2
"foo"
(godebug) next
-> T{}.name3()
(godebug) step
-> if true {
(godebug) print name3
main.T{}
(godebug) continue
Hello
